page.title: 09A VISIT TO EMLEY MOOR MAST
page.content: We visited the mast where Mr, Parker met us. Some went into the control room while I went up the mast. I felt frightened waiting to go up. The lift was slow and noisy taking seven minutes to reach the top where I felt scared and shakey but excited. Suddenly I saw something in the sky. Too big for an aeroplane, it was an airship flying over Barnsley. The scenery was amazing, fields were centimetre sized, cars like pinheads and houses like tiny rocks. I didnt feel the swaying of the mast. During this time Mr, Askey was showing the rest the huge disc drives, computers and typewriters which are much bigger than at school. They were excited when they went in the dark room where they saw the world of television on five different screens. It was an interesting and enjoyoble visit.
